name: @upendra.manike/ts-module-doctor
description: Diagnose and explain TypeScript/Node module resolution errors (module not found, ESM/CJS mismatch, bad path aliases).

exports.name: analyzeModules
exports.description: Analyze a project for common TypeScript module resolution problems.
exports.problemSolved: TS says 'Cannot find module X' even though the package or file exists.
exports.example: const issues = await analyzeModules(['src/**/*.ts'], { tsconfigPath: 'tsconfig.json' }); console.table(issues);
exports.commonUseCase: Debug why imports fail after changing tsconfig paths or migrating to ESM.

useCases: Check tsconfig path aliases vs file structure
